chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in expf (L m zero x y) x0 y_0_1

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
expf_L0_y_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf (L m zero x y) y x_1
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
nf_L_B_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nf m1 = match k with | zero => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | one => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
incr_genus_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> genus m <= genus (L m zero x y)
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
not_eqc_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m zero x y)
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
cF_L : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> cF (L m k x y) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 m one (if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m zero y else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec y (cA_1 m zero z) then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m one x) (cA_1 m zero z) then cA_1 m one y else cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z))
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
incr_genus_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> genus m <= genus (L m one x y)
nc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in nc m0 = nc m + (if eqc_dec m0 x (A m k x) then 0 else 1)
not_eqc_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m one x y)
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nf m0 + 1 | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end : fmap -> Z
inversion_planarity : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> planar (L m k x y) -> planar m
incr_genus : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> genus m <= genus (L m k x y)
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
expfo = fun (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) => expf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expfo_expf : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expfo m x z t < -> expf m z t
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
eqc_eqc_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)

```  
intros m x y H. unfold expf. intros Hinv. apply Hinv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply expf_L0_y_x_1 in H1. exact H1.
